import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import {Avatar, IconButton} from '@material-ui/core'; import FormControl from "@mui/material/FormControl"; import FormLabel from "@mui/material/FormLabel"; import Select from "@mui/material/Select"; import InputLabel from "@mui/material/InputLabel"; import './Pages.scss'; function Profile() { useEffect(() => { getUserInfo(); }) const getUserInfo =()=>{ const userInfo = localStorage.getItem('userInfo'); const user = JSON.parse(userInfo); console.log(user.data) return user?.data.results.user; // console.log(user.data.firstname); } const userDetails = { first_name : "", last_name : "", email : "", gender: "", phone_1 : "", country : "", financial_profesional : false, address: "", phone_2: "", state_of_residence: "", city: "" }; const [userProfile, setUserProfile] = useState(userDetails); const { first_name, last_name, email, gender, phone_1, phone_2, country, financial_profesional, address, city, state_of_residence } = userState; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUserProfile({ ...userProfile, [name]: value }); }; return (
{/* */}

) } export default Profile
